casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Robert Wayne STANLEY. No. 376P02-4. Supreme Court of North Carolina. April 6, 2006. Daniel P. O'Brien, Assistant Attorney General, Thomas J. Keith, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 7th day of March 2006 by Defendant for "Petition for Writ of Certiorari":

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference this the 6th day of April 2006."
